title: Vegas Ramblings
description: Life in Las It's different than anywhere else in the world, especially for a guy working security at a hotel/casino. For several years I wrote a blog about work, driving, and everything in between. Zany, insane, and completely off the wall, I wrote my opinions, observations, and pretty much whatever came into my head. Want to see a funny side to Las Vegas? Then you might as well read my Vegas Ramblings!
author: Robert E. Wacaster
